p: It is assumed that the optimal outcome and ‘clear-cut diagnostic gold standard’ might depend upon the development of hybrid assays in order to minimize the fraction of false negative results. The enhanced RT-qPCR test combined with serological immunoassays (either antibody-detecting or antigen-detecting), would bring an additional diagnostic value for accurate and quick COVID-19 diagnosis in vitro diagnostics, when the human body reacts to an infectious bio-stimulant [ 21].
